definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: What team would you like to avoid in the playoffs ?
sentences.chinese: 哪支球隊是你想避免在季候賽遇到的？

sentences.english: Employee said a deer bit him during hunting season.
sentences.chinese: 員農道正在打獵季候被鹿襲打了。

sentences.english: Thereisno good or bad in life, except whatisgood according to its own season.
sentences.chinese: 生本無好壞之分，只是各個季候有各自的克己。

sentences.english: Last year we were a team not expected to make the playoffs.
sentences.chinese: 上個賽季我們也是並不被認爲能夠進入季候賽。

sentences.english: Youth is the eye lotus spring, third year is that this eye expansion of bubbling spring season.
sentences.chinese: 青春是眼忘憂泉，高三是這眼泉水收縮冒泡的季候。

sentences.english: Do you pay attention to the strong monsoon signal?
sentences.chinese: 你會否留意香港天文臺的強烈季候風信號？

sentences.english: It' s a treason terror of the seasonal oversea seafood is reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 覺得季候性的國外海鮮的代價是公道的便是叛逆。

sentences.english: Flower, or designate an envoy quarter.
A weak northeast monsoon will reach southern China early next week.
sentences.chinese: 一股微弱的東北季候風會在下週初抵達華南。

sentences.english: Aerodrome Warning and the Strong Monsoon Signal were issued.
sentences.chinese: 天文臺發出了機場天氣警報和強烈季候風信號。

sentences.english: How can you win in the playoff with a 9-man roster?Be bold, coach.
sentences.chinese: 只有9個人打球的火箭，怎麼能在季候賽中應求呢？

definition: four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
natural phenomena of a seasonal nature
